data.description: Asks how LGBTI+ identity informs life experiences. Explores how LGBTI+ life experiences differ over time.  Demonstrates the diversity of queer life stories. Examines the intersections of queer identity and other identity categories. Analyzes how religion, disability, race and class influence queer lives. Considers how and why queer memoirs share particular tropes.  Investigates and employs oral history as a tool of preserving LGBTI+ life histories.
data.title: NARRATING QUEER LIVES
